Improvements.Improvement: Refactor repeated code into separate methods
Improvements.Change_Diff: Instead of repeating the code for creating and registering the smartInterceptorDef in each condition, create separate methods like 'createAndRegisterSmartInterceptorForBean' and 'createAndRegisterSmartInterceptorForRef'.
Improvements.Description: There is a lot of repeated code for creating and registering the smartInterceptorDef. This can be refactored into separate methods to improve readability and maintainability.

Improvements.Improvement: Use switch-case instead of multiple if-else statements
Improvements.Change_Diff: Replace the multiple if-else statements with a switch-case statement on 'childElement.getLocalName()'.
Improvements.Description: Instead of using multiple if-else statements to check the local name of the child element, use a switch-case statement. This would make the code cleaner and more readable.
